divs: sighting detailsmy cousin and i were sat upstairs at my grandmother's house. we were just talking casually when i looked out of the window, over the hills of the peak district national park, of which my grandmothers house looks over. i saw a glowing white object traveling quite slowly. the object started speeding up as it went past the house. it was quite far away, probably about half a mile, at fist i thought a small plane might be crash landing, however the object remained in the air. it gained speed at an incredible rate, something i have never seen before, and as it flew off a bright white\blue light filled the room. the event was over as sudden as it had started. my cousin and i both looked at one another and she said," did you see that, the room just lit up!" she was facing the wrong way to see the ufo and only caught the last glimpse of it as it flew off in a lightning burst. i told her what i had seen and she said she had seen something similar a couple of days before over the peak district. similar shape and bright white\blue colour. we would have reported this sighting earlier, however only found out about mufon today.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Macclesfield
This sighting has never been favorited.
